Quartzy (YC S2011) • Accelerating Science in Palo Alto, CA • (www.quartzy.com) • ONSITE

We're hiring a product manager and a product designer to take ownership of our rapidly expanding product. More deets at the links below:

Product Manager: http://grnh.se/jg5p4i

Product Designer: http://grnh.se/n17br6

Quartzy helps scientists keep track of their labs so that they can focus on their research (curing cancer, launching rockets, making glow in the dark monkeys...). With 1/10 scientists in the U.S. using Quartzy, what we do impacts hundreds of thousands of researchers every day. Feel free to email Jane careers[at]quartzy.com with any questions you might have!
